nodes.excerpt: Social media (and PH) are great places to share content, but it's hard to foster new relationships. We built Luma to help your community deepen relationships with events, newsletters, member profiles.

localize.description: ソーシャルメディア（およびPH）は、コンテンツを共有するには最適な場所ですが、新しい関係を育むのは難しいものです。Lumaは、イベント、ニュースレター、メンバーのプロフィールなどで、コミュニティの関係を深めるために作られました。

nodes.excerpt: As a newsletter creator, finding paying sponsors is hard! Swapstack is a marketplace connecting brands & writers to run paid sponsorships. ✍️ As a writer: Work with brands your readers love. 💼 As a brand: Work with writers who speak to your audience.

nodes.excerpt: BounceHunter is a simple way to clean your email list. If you have a dirty email list, our free analyze tool will tell you that. We utilize hybrid verification, a combination of accept all detection and real-time verification, to provide the most accurate results in the industry.

localize.tagline: 实时邮件验证和邮件清理服务

nodes.excerpt: We use software that scrapes the Internet to figure out which stocks are being mentioned more often. We filter through the noise and dig deep into 2-3 stocks. A weekly report is delivered straight to your inbox every Wednesday 9am sharp (PST).

localize.description: 我们用软件在互联网上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的频率较高。我们从噪音中过滤出来，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每周三上午9点整（太平洋标准时间），我们会将周报直接发送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列车到来前分析热点股

localize.description: 我們用軟件在互聯網上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的頻率較高。我們從噪音中過濾出來，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每週三上午9點整（太平洋標準時間），我們會將週報直接發送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列車到來前分析熱點股

nodes.excerpt: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
nodes.title: Ideas for dev - New ideas for your next project
nodes.author: Saeed Moqadam

localize.description: 对我来说，作为一名开发者，找到一个有趣的想法一直是个挑战。如果你还停留在想法阶段，请订阅IdeasFor.dev通讯，每周都能在你的收件箱中收到项目想法。
localize.tagline: 为您的下一个项目提供新思路

localize.description: 對我來說，作爲一名開發者，找到一個有趣的想法一直是個挑戰。如果你還停留在想法階段，請訂閱IdeasFor.dev通訊，每週都能在你的收件箱中收到項目想法。
localize.tagline: 爲您的下一個項目提供新思路

nodes.excerpt: Voices you'll love on productivity, strategy, and more—all for one bundle price. New writers join every month. Access to an evergreen archive of 200+ essays, read by 750k+ curious business people.
nodes.title: Every - A writer collective covering productivity, strategy, & more
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 你会喜欢的关于生产力、战略等方面的声音--所有这些都只需一个捆绑价格。每月都有新作者加入。访问由75万+好奇的商务人士阅读的200多篇文章组成的常青档案。
localize.tagline: 一个涵盖生产力、战略等内容的作家集体。

localize.description: 你會喜歡的關於生產力、戰略等方面的聲音--所有這些都只需一個捆綁價格。每月都有新作者加入。訪問由75萬+好奇的商務人士閱讀的200多篇文章組成的常青檔案。
localize.tagline: 一個涵蓋生產力、戰略等內容的作家集體。

nodes.excerpt: All Hands is a collection of 25 high res photos, featuring hands of all shades, shapes, and sizes, holding iOS devices. Download the layered PSD mockups, add your screens, and diversify how you present your work.
nodes.title: The All Hands Collection - Diversify your product mockups
nodes.author: Jacques H. Bastien

localize.description: 所有的手是25张高分辨率照片的集合，以各种色调，形状和大小的手为特色，手持iOS设备。下载分层的PSD模拟图，添加你的屏幕，让你的作品呈现方式多样化。
localize.tagline: 使你的产品模拟图多样化

localize.description: 所有的手是25張高分辨率照片的集合，以各種色調，形狀和大小的手爲特色，手持iOS設備。下載分層的PSD模擬圖，添加你的屏幕，讓你的作品呈現方式多樣化。
localize.tagline: 使你的產品模擬圖多樣化
